metadata.topic_title: Penetration Testing and Red Team Exercises

active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, debate the ethical and legal considerations of conducting physical penetration tests (e.g., tailgating simulations) versus red team exercises in a real facility. How do these practices build on prior knowledge of physical security controls like access badges and CCTV? Support your arguments with NIST SP 800-115 phases.
